column1: florence l. ahlberg| florence l. anderson
column5: 2015 at the lutheran home at kane. born in wilcox
column6: she was the daughter of olaf and cora silvis ahlberg. she was married to leonard anderson
column7: who preceded her in death. surviving are a niece
column8: peggy jamison of kane and a nephew
column9: james ahlberg of wilcox. several great nieces and nephews also survive. at her request
column10: there will be no visitation nor service. interment of her cremated remains will be in mt. tabor cemetery
